Introduction

Lucia is a South Korean trainee under Inmedia. She was formerly known under the stage names Rucia, Bella, and Aire. She is the leader of the pre-debut girl group WiTCHX.

Lucia is a member of the upcoming girl group WiTCHX and was a former member of the pre-debut girl group INTER GIRLS.
